name: Smartish Companion
description:
• Make trivia night even better with the SmartishTM companion app! Expand your knowledge with new categories ranging from “The 90’s” to “Reality TV.” Who knew being Smartish could be so fun?
• The app works as a companion to the physical Smartish trivia game offering free-to-play and in-app purchases.
• Six new categories with 100 questions available to choose from and more to come!

1. Reality TV & Talk Shows (Free)
2. US Cities (Free)
3. The 90’s
4. War & Pieces
5. AKA
6. Under the Sea
